messages.message:
Pretty interesting article here (https://arxiv.org/abs/2205.01068):

> Given their computational cost, these models are difficult to replicate without significant capital. For the few that are available through APIs, no access is granted to the full model weights, making them difficult to study. We present Open Pre-trained Transformers (OPT), a suite of decoder-only pre-trained transformers ranging from 125M to 175B parameters, which we aim to fully and responsibly share with interested researchers.

Thanks for sharing! Looks like there's a potential of expanding the scope of Instabase's deep learning beyond just encoder-only models. Decoder-only models specialize in generating new text / data. Probably worth posting a link to this Facebook paper to <#C01CF4A2UHZ|> too
